name: Dragon FunFlap
description:
Dragon FunFlap is my first game that I successfully finished and published specially for Stencyl Jam 2013. The game was developed within a month.

Dragon FunFlap is a simple yet fun side-scrolling endless game.

Try to collect all the runes and beat the highscore. Get some power ups to increase your survivability and time your flap with precision to avoid colliding with hazards.
